attack nametypewill neededhit %damagetake willwhere to train to get
scratchpow11AD-starting attack

mid-far

attack nametypewill neededhit %damagetake willwhere to train to get
slamint18BBElife
wing slashpow16DBEspeed
tail assaultpow16ACEskill
tail hookpow24ABDskill


far

attack nametypewill neededhit %damagetake willwhere to train to get
body slamint*25AABlife
flutterpow24BBDspeed
drop assaultpow28CAAint
combinationpow50CSBdefense


*many people trained dragons as power monsters, a natural choice given the multitude and strength of their power attacks. however, i was successful in raising int based dragons, and even though they only have 2 int attacks, they are powerful, frequently hitting int attacks.
